brainly_data.question: Marco makes $65,000 a year as a graphic designer. He makes a charitable donation of $1,000 each year. He also has $5,000 of business-related expenses, including travel and materials. What is Marco’s taxable income? $71,000 $65,000 $64,000 $59,000
brainly_data.subject: Computers and technology
